description: There's nothing more comforting than a golden topped cheesy cauliflower bake. This is sure to become a family favourite.
name: Cauliflower Cheese Pasta Bake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add milk mixture to pasta mixture, then stir to combine. Transfer mixture to a 22 x 32cm roasting pan. Scatter over remaining mozzarella, arrange sage on top, then bake for 15 minutes or until golden. Serve.
